TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Bsngan, title = Bsngan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bsngan} }

S.FORM: = Bsngan = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Syorinsyang ka alang Bsngan. 532 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 1,669 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 94% niqan 1,566 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 6% niqan 103 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Truku 81%, Amis 3%, Tayal 3%, Bunun 1%, Seejiq/Seediq/Seejiq/Seejiq/Sediq 1%, ni rahuq na o 4%. Pusu nniqan alang Pusu kndadax Bsngan, Batakan ni Tasiru tru alang nii ka pnhiyug, kika paru bi alang ni llabang bi dxgal ka alang nii. Nniqan alang Nuysan Skanki nsgan Bsuring alang Bsuring. Gasuc nniqan Mniq narac yayung Riwusi, daya dgiyaq Sincngsan hiya. Mniq quri saw narac hari kska daya nsgan Bsuring, ssiyaw narac silung Taypinyang, dhuq bi gqiyan hidaw Tayuring, kana lnglingay dxgal nii o niqan gasuc truku kmlawa klwaan dxgal kungyuan, kika paru bi alang ni llabang bi dxgal ka alang nii. Lnglingay tiri Mniq babaw breenux kska dgiyaq. Pkkla patas ppanun Mgrig rulu:Bukuy dtuwa mnuda saw Tay9 syeyn do, hrinas hakaw Truku da pqiri narac, mtmay Bsngan, kika dhuq ciway sapah pyasan Bsngan. Ppanan basu: Dtuwa ppanun basu Skanki basu quri Cungte, dhuq saw nniqan sngayan busu do kika balay bi dhuq da! Sjiqan klgan nealang Truku. Djiyun kari Kari truku ni Tlu. Snhiyun cungcyaw Pnrhulan Joro ni Singyeysu. Pnaah alang Niqan daya ni hunac(Mniq alang Bsngan o kika sapah qmpah dha sayang ) wana bi seejiq Bsngan ka asi nniqan hiya seuxal, bukuy do yasa mtmay ka paru gbihur, kika seejiq Sawasaru ni Patakan o tnhjil truma breenux alang Bsngan sapah qmpah hiya sayang, niqan sapah Yani qmpah qyqaya dha. Sipaw niqan gasuc/skrayan Tay9 siyeyn ni alang Mingre hiya o kika alang Bsngan, tna gaga mniq kska dgiyaq ka nniqan dha, ni sdalih bi ddgiyaq Truku uri, daya alang Bsngan o niqan hnici nniqan djiyun seejiq sbiyaw. Hrinas quri Tay9 siyeyn hunac dungan(quri sapah pyasan), kiya ni mnuda su alang Bsngan han, kiya ni nniqan sapah pyasan. Quri sdalih hari Yacosweyni, quri igi o niqan kingal quri truma saw ciway elug, kika Bsngan (alang Bsngan). Pgkla patas rmigaw Pusu nniqan: ◎Kmlawa qmlahang skbiyax hiyi sapah klwaan- (038)611762 Nyusan Skanki nsgan Bsuring 8Rin tg136 ◎Ciway sapah pyasan Sipaw- 038691040/038691053 Nyusan Skanki nsgan Bsuring alang Bsngan Sipaw tg11 ◎Kmlawa qmlahang seejiq sapah klwaan- 038-611344 Nyusan Skanki nsgan Bsuring alang Bsngan tg135 ◎Nyusan Skanki nsgan Bsuring ciway sapah pyasan Bsngan Nyusan Skanki nsgan Bsuring alang Bsngan tg127 ◎Nsgan Bsuring Fus qmlahang Rrabu sapah- 03-8610951 Nyusan Skanki nsgan Bsuring alang Bsngan 6 rin tg97-1 ◎Klwaan Taywan qmlahang seejiq sapah mniq Rucaw - 03-8691329 Nyusan Skanki nsgan Bsuring Rucaw tg17 ◎Nyusan Skanki qmlahang seejiq sapah Sincgn Hehwan nniqan- 03-5991114 Nyusan Skanki nsgan Bsuring alang Bsngan tg28 ◎Truku nniqan saan mrigaw, qqmita ni sngayan dha seejiq- 038-621-111 Nyusan Skanki nsgan Bsuring alang Bsngan elug Fus tg291 ◎Truku nniqan saan mrigaw, qqmita ni sngayan dha seejiq saan smiling dha sapah - Duma uri o : ◎Pyoging Bsuring Teyeynsyang 038-691128 Nsgan Bsuring alang Bsngan Teyeynsyang tg21. ◎Pyoging Truku Bsuring 038-611646 Nsgan Bsuring alang Bsngan

= Bsngan = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Syorinsyang ka alang Bsngan. 532 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 1,669 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 94% niqan 1,566 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 6% niqan 103 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Troko 81%, Amis 3%, Tayal 3%, Bonon 1%, Seejiq/Seediq/Seejiq/Seejiq/Sediq 1%, ni rahoq na o 4%. Poso nniqan alang Poso kndadax Bsngan, Batakan ni Tasiro tro alang nii ka pnhiyog, kika paro bi alang ni llabang bi dxgal ka alang nii. Nniqan alang Noysan Skanki nsgan Bsoring alang Bsoring. Gasoc nniqan Mniq narac yayong Riwosi, daya dgiyaq Sincngsan hiya. Mniq qori saw narac hari kska daya nsgan Bsoring, ssiyaw narac silong Taypinyang, dhoq bi gqiyan hidaw Tayoring, kana lnglingay dxgal nii o niqan gasoc troko kmlawa klwaan dxgal kongyoan, kika paro bi alang ni llabang bi dxgal ka alang nii. Lnglingay tiri Mniq babaw breenox kska dgiyaq. Pkkla patas ppanon Mgrig rolo:Bokoy dtowa mnoda saw Tay9 syeyn do, hrinas hakaw Troko da pqiri narac, mtmay Bsngan, kika dhoq ciway sapah pyasan Bsngan. Ppanan baso: Dtowa ppanon baso Skanki baso qori Congte, dhoq saw nniqan sngayan boso do kika balay bi dhoq da! Sjiqan klgan nealang Troko. Djiyon kari Kari troko ni Tlo. Snhiyon congcyaw Pnrholan Joro ni Singyeyso. Pnaah alang Niqan daya ni honac(Mniq alang Bsngan o kika sapah qmpah dha sayang ) wana bi seejiq Bsngan ka asi nniqan hiya seoxal, bokoy do yasa mtmay ka paro gbihor, kika seejiq Sawasaro ni Patakan o tnhjil troma breenox alang Bsngan sapah qmpah hiya sayang, niqan sapah Yani qmpah qyqaya dha. Sipaw niqan gasoc/skrayan Tay9 siyeyn ni alang Mingre hiya o kika alang Bsngan, tna gaga mniq kska dgiyaq ka nniqan dha, ni sdalih bi ddgiyaq Troko ori, daya alang Bsngan o niqan hnici nniqan djiyon seejiq sbiyaw. Hrinas qori Tay9 siyeyn honac dongan(qori sapah pyasan), kiya ni mnoda so alang Bsngan han, kiya ni nniqan sapah pyasan. Qori sdalih hari Yacosweyni, qori igi o niqan kingal qori troma saw ciway elog, kika Bsngan (alang Bsngan).
